name: path::PathBuf::pop

ffi::os_str::OsString::truncate.doc:
Truncate the `OsString` to the specified length.

 # Panics
 Panics if `len` does not lie on a valid `OsStr` boundary
 (as described in [`OsStr::slice_encoded_bytes`]).
